text: Shaun Toub is an Iranian-American movie and television actor. He is perhaps best known for his role as Farhad in the 2004 movie Crash, as Rahim Khan in the movie The Kite Runner, as Yinsen in the movie Iron Man and as Iroh in the movie The Last Airbender. ==Other websites== * *Shaun Toub cover story in OCPC magazine ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Tehran Category:Iranian movie actors
title: Shaun Toub
